description: This table shows the current "Mark as Reviewed" data for the patient's problem list.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting's encryption utility.

columns.name: PROB_LIST_REV_DATE
columns.description: This is the date the problem list was last reviewed.

columns.name: PROB_LIST_REV_TIME
columns.description: This is the time the problem list was last reviewed.

columns.name: PROB_LIST_REVUSR_ID
columns.description: This is the user who last reviewed the Problem List.

columns.name: PROB_REV_EPT_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient encounter in which the problem list was last reviewed within an encounter context. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
